aboutMe.title: Passion for Precision in Endodontics
aboutMe.description: With over two decades dedicated to dentistry, I specialize in Endodontics, combining advanced techniques with a patient-first approach. I graduated from PUC Campinas in 2002, later enhancing my expertise with specialization in Endodontics at São Leopoldo Mandic (2007), and I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Endodontics (2024-2026) at the same institution. My focus is on delivering precise and pain-free treatments, ensuring my patients receive the highest level of care.

aboutMe.title: Advanced Techniques & Personalized Care
aboutMe.description: In my practice, I integrate ultrasound technology, operating microscopy, and foraminal locators, which allow for unparalleled accuracy in root canal treatments. Whether using manual, rotary, or reciprocating techniques, I tailor procedures to each patient's case, always prioritizing patient comfort and long-term oral health. I believe in a humanized approach to dentistry, where trust, honesty and empathy are at the core of every treatment.

aboutMe.title: Nature, Balance & Lifelong Exploration
aboutMe.description: Beyond my professional life, I find inspiration in nature and mindful living. Whether hiking through serene landscapes, enjoying a peaceful read, or practicing wellness activities, I cherish moments that bring balance to my routine. Traveling with my husband is one of my greatest passions, as it allows me to immerse myself in new cultures while appreciating the beauty of the world.
